campselect.title: Select a camp
campselect.text: Select a camp from the menu.
campselect.loading: Fetching list of camps from the server

campinfo.error_message: Are you connected to the internet? You must be connected to the internet the first time you select a camp to be able to download the information. Try refreshing this page when you have an internet connection.

contact.call_text: This will make a phone call to {{data.Phone}}. Are you sure you want to do this?
